title: Current account surplus, increased capital outflow

content.question: An increase in a country’s current account surplus will result in which of the following in the short run?

choices.label: A decrease in the country’s government budget surplus
A decrease in the country’s national savings
A decrease in the country’s financial account deficit
An increase in the country’s net financial capital outflows
An increase in the country’s national debt

content.answer: An increase in the country’s net financial capital outflows

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
